question: Will Bitcoin or Ethereum perform better in May 2022?
description:
This is a market on whether $BTC or $ETH will perform better on a percentage % basis, in terms of relative change in their USD prices, in the month of May 2022. 

The change of prices will be calculated by dividing the coin’s Open price dated 2022-06-01 (ET) by the coin's Open price dated 2022-05-01, for both $BTC and $ETH, using CoinGecko’s historical pricing data. 

If $BTC’s relative change is greater than $ETH’s, the market will resolve to “Bitcoin”, and if $ETH’s relative change is greater than $BTC, the market will resolve to “Ethereum”. If they are exactly equal, the market will resolve to 50:50.

events.title: Will Bitcoin or Ethereum perform better in...?
events.description: This is a market group on whether $BTC or $ETH will perform better in different time periods.

description:

The first round of the playoffs begins on May 2 with the last games scheduled for May 15, 2022. 

In the upcoming 1st round of the 2022 Stanley Cup playoffs:

If the New York Rangers win, the market will resolve to “Rangers.”

question: Will Madison Cawthorn win the Republican nomination for the NC-11 House election?
description:
This is a market on whether Madison Cawthorn will win the Republican nomination for the 2022 election to the United States House of Representatives for North Carolina's Eleventh Congressional District (NC-11). The primary election is scheduled to take place on May 17, 2022.

If Madison Cawthorn wins the Republican nomination for the NC-11 House election, this market will resolve to “Yes”. Otherwise this market will resolve to “No”.

If the Republican nomination for the NC-11 House election is not made by November 8, 2022, this market will resolve to "No".

Determination of the Republican nominee for the 2022 election for the NC-11 House seat will be based on a consensus of credible reporting, or if there is ambiguity, the final state election authority certification or other final official determination of the 2022 election results.

question: Will Matt Dolan win 2nd place in the Republican primary for the 2022 United States Senate election in Ohio?
description:
This is a market on whether Matt Dolan will win 2nd place in the Republican primary for Senator of Ohio. The primary election is scheduled to take place on May 3, 2022.

If Matt Dolan wins 2nd place in the Republican primary for Senator of Ohio, this market will resolve to “Yes”. Otherwise this market will resolve to “No”.

If Matt Dolan ties for 2nd place in the Republican primary for Senator of Ohio, this market will still resolve to "Yes".

Determination of the winner of 2nd place in the Republican primary for the 2022 election for the Senator of Ohio will be based on a consensus of credible reporting, or if there is ambiguity, the final state election authority certification (
https://www.ohiosos.gov/elections/election-results-and-data/2018-official-elections-results/)
 or other final official determination of the 2022 election results.

question: Will the Russian Ruble (RUB) fall below $0.012 by June 12?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if the dollar price / exchange rate of one Russian Ruble (RUB) falls below $0.01200 at any time between May 2, 2022, and the resolution time of June 12, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET, and to “No” otherwise. 

The primary resolution source for this market will be the foreign exchange platform XE: https://www.xe.com/currencycharts/?from=RUB&to=USD&view=1D 

If the primary resolution source is unavailable at resolution time, the resolution source will be checked at noon every day for the following three days, from June 13 until June 15 (11:59:59 PM ET), after which, if it remains unavailable, other credible reporting will be used.

This market will resolve on midmarket prices with a 10-min resolution.

question: Will the Fed set interest rates above 1.50% after their scheduled June meeting?
description:
The FED interest rates are defined in this market by the upper bound of the target federal funds range. The decisions on the target federal fund range are made by the Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) meetings. The resolution source for this market is the FOMC’s statement after the meeting scheduled for June 14-15 according to the official calendar: https://www.federalreserve.gov/monetarypolicy/fomccalendars.htm.

This market will resolve to “Yes”, if the upper bound of the target federal funds rate will be set above 1.50% following the Federal Reserve's June 2022 meeting, otherwise - it will resolve to “No.”

The level and change of the target federal funds rate is also being published at the official website of the Federal Reserve at https://www.federalreserve.gov/monetarypolicy/openmarket.htm

This market resolves as soon as the FOMC’s statement for their June meeting with relevant data is issued.

If after the conclusion of the scheduled meeting no statement is released by June 22, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET then this market will resolve 50-50.
groupItemTitle: Above 1.50% after June meeting? (75 bips or more)

events.title: Fed Interest Rates June 2022
events.description: Market group
